description: Returns metadata about transactions and their status. To prevent the response from growing indefinitely, only uncommitted transactions and those available for time-travel queries are returned. This operation can help you identify uncommitted transactions or to get information about transactions.

nested_items.name: Transactions
nested_items.description: A list of transactions. The record for each transaction is a TransactionDescription object.

nested_items.name: TransactionStatus
nested_items.description: A status of ACTIVE, COMMITTED, or ABORTED.

nested_items.name: TransactionStartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the transaction started.

nested_items.name: TransactionEndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the transaction committed or aborted, if it is not currently active.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token indicating whether additional data is available.
